page.title: 07LIVING IN GROBY.
page.content: Groby is a nice ,peaceful place.It is not the largest village around,but it has its own industrial estate and enough shops,pubs and houses to make it quit a big village.Groby isn't a pretty village but there are some picturesque houses in the older part. There are masses of houses on the new estates with many more to be built. There are 15 terraced houses on the Ratby Road and these should not be knocked down because they are part of Groby's history.The part around the chapel is pretty and peaceful but the road is very narrow and it difficult to pass parked cars.Over all Groby is a nice place to live and is very convenient for Leicester qnd the motorway,however there is always room for improvement though.
